language.Title: Color Picker
language.About:
Lewies Color Picker version 1.1
This form was created by Lewis Moten in May of 2004. It simulates the color picker in a popular graphics application. It gives users a visual way to choose colors from a large and dynamic palette.
Visit the authors web page? www.lewismoten.com
language.BadNumber: A number between {0} and {1} is required. Closest value inserted.

Image.tooltip: Warning: not a web safe color

Color.tooltip: Click to select web safe color
